contest-event.event-date: Feb. 28, 1953 D Durham League Contest (Section C) Durham League Contest (Section C) 30 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-c The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Welfare Hall, Easington March contest 1st Shildon, 2nd Ryhope Colliery, 3rd Brandon Colliery. 9 bands competed.
